description: Exclusive Networking Evening During Consensus 2026 Date: February 11, 2026 Time: 7:00 PM - 9:30 PM Venue: AOAO Rooftop Bar, Central, Hong Kong EVENT RUNDOWN: Pharos and ANT Digital Technology present an exclusive evening of high-altitude networking at one of Hong Kong s iconic rooftop bars. Set against the backdrop of the Hong Kong skyline, this invitation-only gathering brings together visionaries, builders, investors, and industry leaders during Consensus 2026. Experience meaningful connections in a curated atmosphere - this evening offers a perfect blend of relaxed networking and focused business development opportunities. Attendees will also gain exclusive insights into Pharos highly anticipated upcoming mainnet launch, including key milestones, technical innovations, and opportunities for ecosystem participation. Why Attend: Connect with the core team from Pharos and ANT Digital Technology Engage with decision-makers in a relaxed, premium setting Discover partnership and integration opportunities with the Pharos ecosystem Forge relationships that bridge TradFi and Web3 innovation Receive first-hand updates and insights on Pharos upcoming mainnet launch Co-Hosted by: Pharos Network Ant Digital Technology Inc. In partnership with: 499 DAO - Asia's largest decentralized organisation Hypernative Labs - Detect and neutralize Web3 threats in real time Nirvana Labs - The Performance Cloud for Web3 Re7 Capital - a DeFi centric investment firm specialising in DeFi yields,...
